name: dieBug
body:
## dieBug?
With dieBug, you can easily create Screenshots. 

## Why dieBug?
* Images selfhosted
* beautiful GUI(Client and Server)
* easy configuration
*fast installation( no installation at PC; setup wizard for server)
* Capture windows, the whole screen or a userdefined area
* free
* unlimited space, caiused by selfhosting on any server that supports PHP
* administrate your hosted images

## Screenshots
![Image GUI](http://i.imagebanana.com/img/cr6ec0ia/diebugscreen1.JPG)

## Download
Coming soon

## Who's dieBug?
dieBug is developed by the two students @SebRut and @denkenreden, who are both interested in Technology. @SebRut takes cares of the Client coding and @denkenreden makes the GUIs and server stuff.

## Tech Stuff
### Client
* C#, .NET Framework 4.5
* WPF

### Server
* PHP
* CSS, HTML5

## History
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
